original: 建安十七年，獻帝為示榮寵，准曹操「參拜不名、入朝不趨、劍履上殿」，如漢丞相蕭何故事。
text: In the seventeenth year of Jian'an, the emperor was presented as a show of honor and favor, and the quasi-Cao Cao 'visited without name, entered the dynasty, and went to the palace with the sword', like the story of the prime minister of the Han Dynasty, Xiao He.
